name: ext_R5_SubstanceDefinition_characterization
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SubstanceDefinition.characterization for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceDefinition.characterization from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: General specifications for this substance
element.definition: `SubstanceDefinition.characterization` has no related element in R4B:SubstanceDefinition

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource

constraint.human: Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: Unique id for inter-element referencing
element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.short: The method used to find the characterization e.g. HPLC
element.definition: The method used to elucidate the characterization of the drug substance. Example: HPLC.
